name: CareConnect-Communication-1
description: This resource is a record of a communication. A communication is a conveyance of information from one entity, a sender, to another entity, a receiver. The sender and receivers may be patients, practitioners, related persons, organizations, or devices.
purpose: [NOT CURATED BY INTEROPEN see: http://www.interopen.org/careconnect-curation-methodology/] Initial development for the Digital Maternity programme
